titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Pittsburgh Zionist District Records, 1945-1965 AIS.1968.12
titlestmt.author: Allyson Glazier.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:41:15 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: The Pittsburgh Zionist District Records document the activities of the Pittsburgh chapter of the Zionist Organization of America between 1945 and 1965. The collection consists primarily of correspondence, campaign materials, publicity, committee materials andn reports, records of celebrations and dinners, fundraising and membership records, programs, and publications.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mr. H.H. Kimel of the Pittsburgh Zionist District on June 28, 1968.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Pittsburgh Zionist District Records, 1945-1965, AIS.1968.12, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pittsburgh Zionist District Records, 1945-1965, AIS.1968.12, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was minimally processed by Archives Service Center Staff in 1968; the records remain in their original order.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Farband-Labor Zionist Order Records, 1950-1970, AIS.1998.13, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
Hadassah, Pittsburgh Chapter Records, 1917-1968, AIS.1968.13, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
Histadrut Records, 1956-1990, AIS.2010.08, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
United Jewish Federation of Pittsburgh Records, 1912-1964, AIS.1997.24, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Pittsburgh Zionist District is the Pittsburgh chapter of the Zionist Organization of America (founded in 1897), the oldest American Zionist organization. Its mission is to "build support for Israel and strengthen the United States/Israel relationship through public education, the media and public activism," according to the Jewish Federation of Greater Pittsburgh. The Pittsburgh chapter was one of the earliest chapters and dates to 1938, if not earlier. While it used to cover a large geographical area, spanning from Pennsylvania to Ohio, West Virginia, and even parts of New York, currently, it is based only in Western Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: The Pittsburgh Zionist District Records include correspondence, memoranda, and papers of the Executive Directors and Presidents (1955-1965); minutes, correspondence, nominations of the Executive Board (1955-1965); committee reports; membership correspondence, mailings, lists (paid, unpaid, resigned), campaigns, membership Dues Book (partial: M-Z), 1945-1955; financial records-paid bills, dues, receipts, fund drives, Contributions Record Book, 1955-1965; meetings of conferences and conventions; social, cultural, political activities and developments; public relations; regional reports; photographs; local organization publications including Pittsburgh Zionist; miscellaneous publications from other Jewish groups; and memorabilia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records remain in their original order.
